Overlord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Timelord.en: Critical fixes to Adobe's most recent updates. Required to continue transferring shape data between Ai and Ae.

Anubis.en:
Fixes

In preparation for new some future features, we broke the relative render paths and BG rendering in Ae. Sorry about that.

Rubberhose 3.en:
Small bug fixes and styles

Thank you for getting started with Rubberhose 3 in its first week. It really means a lot to us.

Fixes

  • Remove apostrophes from hose names to avoid expression error
  • result[name].sort is undefined error
  • Expression errors when controller parent scale [ 0, 0 ]
  • Bend Crease style expression error
  • Support for scaling styles:
    •   Basic outline
    •   Bend crease
    •   Fancy pants
    •   Noodle
    •   Noodle+

To update the default style presets:

  1. Right click the Rubberhose 3 panel > Open styles folder
  2. Delete the folder /styles/Rubberhose 3/
  3. Right click the Rubberhose 3 panel > Reload styles
